title: 2021 Kdp Niche Research Strategy | $100k a Month Kdp Niches!

tactics.name: Coloring Book Niche Research
tactics.description: Identify low-competition KDP niches using coloring books for kids by analyzing Amazon search results and BSR ranks.
steps: Visit Creativefabrica.com and navigate to kids' coloring book sections
Search Amazon for specific coloring book titles
Check BSR ranks and sales potential via tckpublishing.com calculator
caveats: May fail if niche becomes oversaturated
example_niches: ancient egypt coloring book for kids
source_quotes: this one is ranked seven thousand this one is rank fourth is forty thousand

heuristics.name: Low Competition Filter
heuristics.condition: If BSR rank exceeds 50000 and review count under 200, prioritize niche
source_quotes: this one is ranked seven thousand this one is rank fourth is forty thousand

claims.statement: A BSR rank of 7,000 can generate $1,000 monthly sales for a coloring book
source_quotes: this is making like 500 sales per month

niche_patterns.description: Target specific age groups with unique needs and limitations
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines broad appeal with niche-specific solutions
